snippet: Ed Rush resigned as the Pac-12 conference’s basketball coordinator of officials after comments during meetings before the league tournament that appeared critical of Arizona Coach Sean Miller.
abstract: Ed Rush resigns as Pac-12 conference’s basketball coordinator of officials after comments during meetings before the league tournament that appeared critical of Arizona coach Sean Miller.
lead_paragraph: Ed Rush resigned as the Pac-12 conference’s basketball coordinator of officials after comments during meetings before the league tournament that appeared critical of Arizona Coach Sean Miller.

headline.seo: Pac-12 Conference Official Ed Rush Resigns
